# Pirminė duomenų analizė

## Išskirtys

### Pagrindinė dalis

```{r}
count_outliers <- function(data, var_name) {
  data %>%
    summarise(
      variable = var_name,
      Q1 = quantile(.data[[var_name]], 0.25),
      Q3 = quantile(.data[[var_name]], 0.75),
      H = Q3 - Q1,
      inner_low = Q1 - 1.5*H,
      inner_high = Q3 + 1.5*H,
      outer_low = Q1 - 3*H,
      outer_high = Q3 + 3*H,
      mild_outliers = sum((.data[[var_name]] < inner_low & .data[[var_name]] > outer_low) | (.data[[var_name]] > inner_high &   .data[[var_name]] < outer_high)),
      extreme_outliers = sum(.data[[var_name]] < outer_low | .data[[var_name]] > outer_high)
      )
}
```

```{r}
numeric_cols <- sampled_data %>%
```

### Daugiamatės išskirtys

```{r}
check_bounds <- function(x, col_name, info) {
  limits <- info[info$variable == col_name, ]
  as.integer(x < as.numeric(limits$outer_low) | x > as.numeric(limits$outer_high))
}
```

```{r}
data_outlier_info <- sampled_data

data_outlier_info <- sampled_data %>%
  mutate(
    across(
      all_of(numeric_cols), 
      ~ check_bounds(.x, cur_column(), outlier_summary),
      .names = "is_out_by_{.col}"
    )
  )

data_outlier_info <- data_outlier_info %>%
  mutate(outlier_dim = rowSums(across(starts_with("is_out_by_")), na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  arrange(desc(outlier_dim))
```

```{r}
data_outlier_info <- data_outlier_info %>%
  mutate(is_outlier = as.integer(outlier_dim > 1) )
```

### Aibių palyginimas

```{r}
out_set <- data_outlier_info %>% 
  filter(is_out_by_delinq.2yrs == 1 | is_out_by_pub.rec == 1 | is_out_by_revol.bal == 1)

in_set <- data_outlier_info %>% 
  filter(is_out_by_delinq.2yrs != 1 & is_out_by_pub.rec != 1 & is_out_by_revol.bal != 1)

```

```{r}
char_function_out <- function(data, columns){
  data %>%
    select(all_of(columns)) %>% 
    summarise(across(everything(), 
                     list(min = ~min(.x), 
                          max = ~max(.x), 
                          mean = ~mean(.x),
                          sd = ~sd(.x),
                          q25 = ~quantile(.x, 0.25),
                          median = ~median(.x),
                          q75 = ~quantile(.x, 0.75)))) %>% 
    pivot_longer(everything(), names_to = c("Variable", ".value"), names_sep = "_")
}
```

```{r}
indicators <- c("int.rate", "annual.inc", "dti", "fico")
char_out_set <- char_function_out(out_set, indicators) 
char_in_set <- char_function_out(in_set, indicators)

Variable_col <- char_out_set %>% select(Variable)
out_group_col <- data.frame(set = rep("Išskirtis", nrow(Variable_col)))
in_group_col <- data.frame(set = rep("Neišskirtis", nrow(Variable_col)))

char_out_set <- char_out_set %>% 
  select(-Variable) %>% 
  round(2) %>% 
  cbind(Variable_col, out_group_col)

char_in_set <- char_in_set %>% 
  select(-Variable) %>% 
  round(2) %>% 
  cbind(Variable_col, in_group_col)

char_of_sets <- rbind(char_out_set, char_in_set)
char_of_sets
```

## Skaitinės charakteristikos

```{r}
Modes <- function(x) {
  ux <- unique(x)
  tab <- tabulate(match(x, ux))
  ux[tab == max(tab)][1]
}
```

```{r}
char <- sampled_data %>% 
  summarise(across(where(is.numeric),
            list(mean = ~mean(.x), 
                 sd = ~sd(.x),
                 median = ~median(.x),
                 mode = ~if (cur_column() %in% c("inq.last.6mths", "delinq.2yrs", "pub.rec")){Modes(.x)} else {NA}))) %>% 
  pivot_longer(everything(), 
               names_to = c("Variable", ".value"), 
               names_sep = "_") %>% 
  mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~ round(.x, 4)))
char
```


```{r}
char_function <- function(data, groups, column){
  data %>%
    group_by(across({{groups}})) %>% 
    summarise(min = min(.data[[column]]), 
              max = max(.data[[column]]), 
              mean = mean(.data[[column]]),
              sd = sd(.data[[column]]),
              q25 = quantile(.data[[column]], 0.25),
              median = median(.data[[column]]),
              q75 = quantile(.data[[column]], 0.75),
              mode = if (column %in% c("inq.last.6mths", "delinq.2yrs", "pub.rec")){Modes(.data[[column]])} else {NA}) %>%
    mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~ round(.x, 4)))
}

numeric_variables <- sampled_data %>% 
  select(where(is.numeric)) %>% 
  names()

all_char_tables <- lapply(numeric_variables, function(variable) {
  char_function(sampled_data, c(credit.policy, purpose), variable)})

names(all_char_tables) <- numeric_variables

all_char_tables$int.rate
int.rate_table <- char_function(sampled_data, c(credit.policy, purpose), "int.rate")
```

## Duomenų aibės normavimas

```{r}
min_max_normalization <- function(x){
  return((x-min(x)) / (max(x)-min(x)))
}
```

```{r}
min_max_normalized <- sampled_data %>% 
  select(where(is.numeric)) %>% 
  mutate(across(everything(), min_max_normalization))
```

```{r}
mean_sd_normalization <- function(x){
  return((x-mean(x)) / sd(x))
}
```

```{r}
mean_sd_normalized <- sampled_data %>% 
  select(where(is.numeric)) %>% 
  mutate(across(everything(), mean_sd_normalization))
```
